fi.left2die.gameobject
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  fi.left2die.gameobject.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameWorld, Map, MovableEntity, RadioButtonBox
public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

Base class for game world object. Basically almost every thing in game world is entity world, enemies, player.

Author:
TeeMuki
